001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.zeromq;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
004import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.BehaviorProcessor;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.FlowableProcessor;
009import org.bitcoinj.core.BitcoinSerializer;
010import org.bitcoinj.core.Block;
011import org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters;
012import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
013import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
014import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.ChainTipService;
015import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.RxBitcoinClient;
016import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.RxBlockchainService;
017
018import java.io.Closeable;
019import java.net.URI;
020import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
021
022
023/**
024 *  Add conversion to bitcoinj-types to {@code RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService}. Also
025 *  uses the JSON-RPC client to fetch an initial {@link Block} so subscribers don't
026 *  have to wait ~ten minutes for one.
027 */
028public class RxBitcoinZmqService extends RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService implements RxBlockchainService, ChainTipService, Closeable {
029    private final BitcoinSerializer bitcoinSerializer;
030
031    private final FlowableProcessor<ChainTip> flowableChainTip = BehaviorProcessor.create();
032    private final Disposable blockSubscription;
033
034    public RxBitcoinZmqService(Network network, URI rpcUri, String rpcUser, String rpcPassword) {
035        this(new RxBitcoinClient(network, rpcUri, rpcUser, rpcPassword));
036    }
037
038    public RxBitcoinZmqService(RxBitcoinClient client) {
039        super(client);
040        bitcoinSerializer = NetworkParameters.of(network).getSerializer();
041        blockSubscription = blockPublisher()
042                .flatMapSingle(client::activeChainTipFromBestBlock)
043                .distinctUntilChanged(ChainTip::getHash)
044                .subscribe(this::onNextChainTip, flowableChainTip::onError, flowableChainTip::onComplete);
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public Network network() {
049        return network;
050    }
051
052    @Override
053    public Flowable<Transaction> transactionPublisher() {
054        return transactionBinaryPublisher()
055                .map(bytes -> new Transaction(NetworkParameters.of(network), ByteBuffer.wrap(bytes)));   // Deserialize to Transaction
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public Flowable<Sha256Hash> transactionHashPublisher() {
060        return transactionHashBinaryPublisher()
061                .map(Sha256Hash::wrap);            // Deserialize to Sha256Hash
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public Flowable<Block> blockPublisher() {
066        return blockBinaryPublisher()
067                .map(ByteBuffer::wrap)
068                .map(bitcoinSerializer::makeBlock)  // Deserialize to bitcoinj Block
069                .startWith(client.getBestBlockViaRpc()); // Use JSON-RPC client to fetch an initial block
070    }
071    
072    @Override
073    public Flowable<Sha256Hash> blockHashPublisher() {
074        return blockHashBinaryPublisher()
075                .map(Sha256Hash::wrap);             // Deserialize to Sha256Hash
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public Flowable<Integer> blockHeightPublisher() {
080        return chainTipPublisher()
081                .map(ChainTip::getHeight);          // Extract block height
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public Flowable<ChainTip> chainTipPublisher() {
086        return flowableChainTip;
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public void close()  {
091        super.close();
092        blockSubscription.dispose();
093    }
094
095    // For setting breakpoints
096    void onNextChainTip(ChainTip tip) {
097        flowableChainTip.onNext(tip);
098    }
099}
